sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
	b-container.test(fluid)
		.h6 D3 barchart
		.chart#chartData
</template>

<style lang="scss"scoped>
	.chart {
		height:250px;
	}
	.barclass {
	}
	.textclass {
		color:red;
		font-size:8px;
	}
</style>

<script>
/* eslint-disable */
import * as d3 from 'd3';

export default {
	name       : 'simple-bar-chart',
	components : {
		// nothing yet
	},
	props : {
		barColor : {
			type : String
		},
		height : {
			type : String
		},
		width : {
			type : String
		},
		maxBars : {
			type : Number
		},
		numVerticleTicks : {
			type : Number
		},
		someParam : {
			type : Number
		},
		roundedCorners : {
			type : Number
		}
	},
	mounted() {
		// console.log('mounted simpleBarChart');
		this.init();
	},
	methods : {
		shortnum( nums ) {
			let num = nums;
			num = Number( num / 1000 ).toPrecision( 2 );
			num = num.replace( /^0+/, '' );
			num += 'k';
			// console.log( `translate: ${num}` );
			return num;
		},
		init() {
			// Parameters available to the d3 scope
			const height = ( ( this.height ) ? this.height : '100%' );
			const width = ( ( this.width ) ? this.width : '100%' );
			const barwidth = ( ( this.barwidth ) ? this.barwidth : 20 );
			const barpadding = ( ( this.barpadding ) ? this.barpadding : 10 );
			const barclass = ( ( this.barclass ) ? this.barclass : 'barclass' );
			const barColor = ( ( this.barColor ) ? this.barColor : 'red' );
			const tickColor = ( ( this.tickColor ) ? this.tickColor : 'grey' );
			const roundedCorners = ( ( this.roundedCorners ) ? this.roundedCorners : '5' );
			const textclass = ( ( this.textclass ) ? this.textclass : 'textclass' );
			const yTickWidth = ( ( this.y_tickWidth ) ? this.y_tickwidth : 200 );
			const yTickCount = this.tick_y.length;

			// unscaled margins
			let margin = {
				top    : 10,
				bottom : 15,
				left   : 10,
				right  : 10,
			};

			const xDomainScale = ( this.chart_data.length * ( barwidth + ( barpadding * 2 ) ) );
			const x = d3.scaleLinear()
				  .domain( [0, xDomainScale] )
				  .range( [0, width] );

			const y = d3.scaleLinear()
				  .domain( [0, d3.max( this.chart_data )] )
				  .range( [0, ( height - margin.top - margin.bottom )] );

			// scaled margins
			margin = {
				top    : y( margin.top ),
				bottom : y( margin.bottom ),
				left   : x( margin.left ),
				right  : x( margin.right ),
			};

			const chartObject = [];
			let cnt = 0;
			for ( const li in this.chart_data ) {
				const chart_item = {
					'chart_item' : this.chart_data[li],
					'num'        : cnt,
					'tick_x'     : this.tick_x[li],
					'tick_y'     : this.tick_y[li],
					'barColor'   : this.byBarColor[li]
				};
				chart_object.push( chart_item );
				cnt++;
			}

			const container = document.getElementById( 'chartData' );
			if ( container ) {
				const chart = d3.create( 'svg' )
					  .style( 'font', '22px sans-serif' )
					  .style( 'text-align', 'right' )
					  .style( 'color', 'white' )
					  .style( 'height', height )
					  .style( 'width', width )
					  .style( 'margin-left', margin.left )
					  .style( 'margin-right', margin.right );

				// Draw Bottom Line
				chart.append( 'line' )
					.style( 'stroke', '#444' )
					.style( 'stroke-width', 1 )
					.attr( 'x1', 0 )
					.attr( 'x2', x( width - yTickWidth ) )
					.attr( 'y1', height - margin.bottom + 2 )
					.attr( 'y2', height - margin.bottom + 2 );

				// Bottom Line Shadow
				chart.append( 'line' )
					.style( 'stroke', '#CCC' )
					.style( 'stroke-width', 1 )
					.attr( 'x1', 0 )
					.attr( 'x2', ( width - yTickWidth ) )
					.attr( 'y1', height - margin.bottom + 3 )
					.attr( 'y2', height - margin.bottom + 3 );

				// Draw Bars
				chart.selectAll( 'svg' )
					.data( chart_object )
					.join( 'rect' )
					.attr( 'fill', d => ( ( d.barColor ) ? d.barColor : barColor ) )
					.attr( 'class', barclass )
					.attr( 'height', d => `${y( d.chart_item )}px` )
					.attr( 'width', x( barwidth ) )
					.attr( 'rx', x( roundedCorners ) )
					.attr( 'x', d => `${x( margin.left + ( d.num * ( barwidth + barpadding * 2 ) ) )}px` )
					.attr( 'y', d => `${y( height - y( d.chart_item ) - margin.bottom )}px` );

				// Draw Numbers Above Bars
				chart.selectAll( 'svg' )
					.data( chart_object )
					.join( 'text' )
					.attr( 'font-size', '{y(12)+\'px\')}' )
					.attr( 'fill', d => ( ( d.barColor ) ? d.barColor : barColor ) )
					.attr( 'class', textclass )
					.attr( 'height', '20' )
					.attr( 'width', ( barwidth + barpadding ) )
					.attr( 'x', d => `${x( ( margin.left - 1 ) + ( d.num * ( barwidth + barpadding * 2 ) ) )}px` )
					.attr( 'y', d => `${y( height - y( d.chart_item ) - 20 )}px` )
					.text( d => this.shortnum( d.chart_item ) );

				// Draw X axis ticks
				chart.selectAll( 'svg' )
					.data( chart_object )
					.join( 'text' )
					.attr( 'font-size', '{y(12)+\'px\')}' )
					.attr( 'fill', tickColor )
					.attr( 'class', textclass )
					.attr( 'height', '20' )
					.attr( 'width', ( barwidth + barpadding ) )
					.attr( 'x', d => `${x( margin.left - 2 + ( d.num * ( barwidth + barpadding * 2 ) ) )}px` )
					.attr( 'y', y( 1230 ) )
					.text( d => d.tick_x );

				// Draw Y axis ticks
				chart.selectAll( 'svg' )
					.data( this.tick_y )
					.join( 'text' )
					.attr( 'font-size', '{y(12)+\'px\')}' )
					.attr( 'fill', 'grey' )
					.attr( 'width', y_tickWidth )
					.attr( 'x', x( width - yTickWidth ) )
					.attr( 'y', ( d, i ) => {
						// console.log( `total width: ${height + margin.top + margin.bottom}` );
						// console.log( `increment length: ${( height + margin.top + margin.bottom ) / yTickCount}` );
						// console.log( `final number: ${( ( Number( height ) + Number( margin.top ) + Number( margin.bottom ) ) / y_tick_count ) * i}` );
						return ( ( ( Number( height ) + Number( margin.top ) + Number( margin.bottom ) ) / yTickCount ) * i );
					} )
					.text( d => d );
				container.appendChild( chart.node() );
			}
			else {
				// console.log( 'Something bad happened!' );
			}
		}
	},
	data : () => ( {
		chart_data : [680, 730, 750, 871, 1024, 138],
		tick_x     : ['2015', '2016', '2017', '2018', '2019', '2020'],
		tick_y     : ['1.25k', '1k', '.75k', '.50k', '.25k', '0k'],
		byBarColor : [null, null, null, 'blue', null, null]
	} )
};
</script>
